sentence.Network_en: CONCLUSION Adenotonsillectomy or adenoidectomy is effective in treatment of children adenoidal hypertrophy with OSAHS.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论儿童OSAHS手术治疗有助于改善儿童的短时记忆.

sentence.Network_en: Methods: 32 patients with adenoidal hypertrophy were treated by radiofrequency under nasal endoscopy.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法对32例腺样体肥大的患者采取鼻内窥镜下射频治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To probe into the value of nasopharynx lateral film in the diagnosis of adenoidal hypertrophy.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨鼻咽侧位片对腺样体肥大的诊断价值.
